name: Faustina
greetingText: Just wanted to take a moment to say... HAPPY BIRTHDAY!! 🎉🎂
wishText: May life bless you with happiness, success, and all the love your heart desires. 💫
text1: I truly appreciate the way you treated me that day.
textInChatBox: You radiate such grace and strength. By the way, that moment was as beautiful as the person you are. ✨
text2: I was going to send a simple birthday text...
text4: I realized, I wanted to do something
text5Content: You are special Friend to me💕
outroText: Now go enjoy your day, have lots of cake 🍰, and make the most wonderful memories!
replayText: While you’re busy caring for everyone around you, remember — Don't forget to take care of Yourself.
